question: Technology uses the knowledge and skill gained from ____ to provide and make life comfortable.
Science education provides studies on _____ and _____ around us.
Technology uses ______ to provide our basic needs.
Practical science is taught in the _______?
Practical technology is taught in the _______?
Technology-related professions and occupations are broadly classified into the following except.
The following are not technical-related professions except.
The following are technology literacy except.
options: To equip the child with weapon of mass destruction
To make them understand technology and become creative.
To equip the child with mental skill and capacity to solve everyday problems.
ans: To equip the child with weapon of mass destruction

question: Development of technology has enabled humanity to communicate more effectively?
Does technology make use of natural resources?
